#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
#define LL long long
const int MAXN = 1e5 + 10;
const LL MOD = 1e9 + 7;
 
int main(){
    int n,x;
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>n;
        int cnt = -1;
        for(int i = 1;i <= n;++i){
            cin>>x;
            if(x == -1){
                ++cnt;
            }
        }
        cout<<cnt*0.5 + 1<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
